## Usage

### Setting an Image
- Right-click the system tray icon
- Select "Load Image..."
- Choose a PNG or JPG file

- Right-click the system tray icon
- Select "Mirror Horizontal" to toggle

- Open your video conferencing app \(Zoom, Teams, etc.\)
- Go to video settings
- Select "Sacrament Virtual Camera" as your camera
